snippet: The Orchestra of the Swan have recorded Hans Gál’s Fourth Symphony and Robert Schumann’s Second Symphony in a pairing that situates Gál in music history.
abstract: James R Oestreich reviews Gal: Symphony No 4; Schumann: Symphony No 2, recorded by Orchestra of the Swan, conducted by Kenneth Woods.
lead_paragraph: The Orchestra of the Swan have recorded Hans Gál’s Fourth Symphony and Robert Schumann’s Second Symphony in a pairing that situates Gál in music history.

headline.seo: Orchestra of the Swan Record Gál and Schumann
headline.main: Orchestra of the Swan Record Gál and Schumann
headline.print_headline: Gál: Symphony No. 4; Schumann: Symphony No. 2
